featured.text: This story may sound highly credible, but there seems to be no solid evidence that it inspired the creation of the 35 we know of today as fortune cookies.
This course will provide students with a solid ______ for research.
In addition, bottled water produces an incredible amount of solid 30 .
As the flights grew longer, a new set of two collection bags was devised, _(24)_ for liquid wastes and the other for solid wastes.
They also have an 25 flavor and a higher percentage of solids.

definition.zh_def: 固體的；堅固的，無法輕易改變形狀的。
definition.en_def: Firm and stable in shape; not liquid or fluid.
definition.example: The table is made of solid wood.
